name: lagomstronk
description: Track your gym workouts, progress, and personal records

scripts.build: mkdir -p www && cp -r index.html manifest.json sw.js css js icons www/
scripts.cap:init: npx cap init LagomStronk se.lagomstronk.app --web-dir www
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android

author: Jeppe Morris
